chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: The Dragon, p. 16 (5)—Name by which Lews Therin Telamon was known during the War of the Shadow. His rebirth, the Dragon Reborn, is now alive and fulfilling all of the prophecies set to accompany him. See also al'Thor, Rand; Dragon Reborn; Lord of the Morning; Telamon, Lews Therin.
